text: 5.15: Ais 33.24; Mt 9.2; Mk 16.18Mbe maaŋ muuŋgip, Fhe Bakɨme khothɨgɨp ana phorgɨp suanga, Guma Bakɨme mba rɨɨi guma rɨmrɨm vhɨzgip, ana kurarim, ana taagip khavgirga. Ana maaŋ muuŋgip, vhɨra tɨva mbatɨk thueŋ muuŋgi, ana vhɨra ne bun suaŋrim, mbe vhɨra ne suaŋv Fhe Bakɨme phorgɨ suaŋrim, Guma Bakɨme mba tɨva mbatɨgeŋ vhɨzgip, ne ndɨkndɨk ŋangirga.
